name: The Code
overview: It is time to save the world. This is a game in which requires your C64's keyboard. The aim of the game is to try to save the world from a major catastrophe by guessing the correct number. You have a set time to take a guess. The computer will let you know whether or not you are too high or too low or guessed correctly. For each correct guess, you will score bonus points. As each level progresses the game will become much harder.
